attributes.action: call on the motor industry to label tyres with simple best before dates.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Auto Express magazine's Tyre Wars campaign has found that a tyre's age can significantly affect its performance – even if its tread is still legal.
With over 1,000 deaths and serious injuries caused by dodgy rubber in 2007 alone, we want complicated date codes to be replaced with a guideline Best Before label so motorists understand how old their tyres are - and know when to replace them.
